name: Magic21
description:
There are a bunch of mobile games where you need to spend a lot of money and to understand complicated rules. You might be tired of them. Don't worry about it,  Magic 21 is a great game that has simple rules but deeply strategic.

All you need to win the match in this game is to read the opponent's mind, cast game-changing spells, and believe your luck!

Key Features:
• Blackjack (21) based card game.
• Competitive real-time (player vs. player) combat.
• There are several spells you can cast are able to be game-changer.

If you have any questions, feel free to ask us anytime at magic21-support@curiouspark.com

Also, we have a Discord community. Join us! 
https://discord.gg/AqVNF3
